snippet: The playwright Gary Winter combines unconventional, sometimes spooky elements in “Daredevil.”
abstract: Alexis Soloski reviews Gary Winter play Daredevil, directed by Meghan Finn, at the Brick theater.
lead_paragraph: The playwright Gary Winter combines unconventional, sometimes spooky elements in “Daredevil.”

headline.seo: In ‘Daredevil,’ Gary Winter Weaves Quirky Stories
headline.main: Story Lines (and More) Assembled in Parts
headline.print_headline: Story Lines (and More) Assembled in Parts
